text: The world produces enough food to feed 10 billion people.
A caterpillar has 4,000 muscles, compared to 640 in humans.
The Eiffel Tower shrinks 6 inches in winter.
A group of ladybugs is called a loveliness.
The world's largest man-made structure is the Fresh Kills Landfill.
A flamingo can only eat with its head upside down.
The world's largest pyramid is in Mexico, not Egypt.
A group of ferrets is called a business.
The world's deepest lake is Lake Baikal at 5,387 feet.
A group of vultures is called a venue.
The world's oldest tree is over 5,000 years old.
A group of wombats is called a wisdom.
The world's largest cave is in Vietnam.
A group of coyotes is called a band.
The world's tallest tree is over 380 feet tall.
A group of elk is called a gang.
The world's largest flower weighs up to 24 pounds.
A group of emus is called a mob.
The world's smallest country is Vatican City at 0.17 square miles.
A group of finches is called a charm.
The world's largest seed weighs up to 40 pounds.
A group of foxes is called a skulk.
The world's longest cave system is Mammoth Cave at 400 miles.
A group of giraffes is called a journey.
The world's largest salt flat is Salar de Uyuni.
A group of gnats is called a cloud.
The world's largest coral reef is the Great Barrier Reef.
A group of gorillas is called a band.
The world's longest river is the Nile at 4,132 miles.
A group of grasshoppers is called a cloud.
The world's largest island is Greenland.
A group of hawks is called a cast.
The world's highest waterfall is Angel Falls at 3,212 feet.
A group of hedgehogs is called an array.
The world's largest hot desert is the Sahara.
A group of herons is called a siege.
The world's deepest ocean is the Pacific at 36,161 feet.
A group of hornets is called a nest.
The world's largest bay is the Bay of Bengal.
A group of hummingbirds is called a charm.
The world's largest peninsula is Arabia.
A group of hyenas is called a cackle.
The world's longest glacier is in Antarctica at 250 miles.
A group of iguanas is called a mess.
The world's highest capital city is La Paz, Bolivia.
A group of jaguars is called a shadow.
The world's largest delta is the Ganges Delta.
A group of kangaroos is called a mob or troop.
The world's largest estuary is the St. Lawrence.
A group of koalas is called a cling.
The world's largest lagoon is in New Caledonia.
A group of leopards is called a leap.
The world's largest atoll is Kiritimati.
A group of lizards is called a lounge.
The world's largest mangrove forest is the Sundarbans.
A group of locusts is called a plague.
The world's largest swamp is the Pantanal.
A group of manatees is called an aggregation.
The world's largest fjord is Scoresby Sund.
A group of mice is called a mischief.
The world's largest archipelago is Indonesia.
A group of moles is called a labor.
The world's largest reef system spans 1,400 miles.
A group of mongooses is called a mob.
The world's highest mountain from base to peak is Mauna Kea.
A group of moose is called a herd.
The world's largest rainforest is the Amazon.
A group of mosquitoes is called a scourge.
The world's longest mountain range is the Andes at 4,500 miles.
A group of mussels is called a bed.
The world's largest plateau is the Tibetan Plateau.
A group of narwhals is called a blessing.
The world's highest active volcano is Ojos del Salado.
A group of nightingales is called a watch.
The world's largest volcanic caldera is Toba.
A group of octopuses is called a consortium.
The world's deepest freshwater lake is Lake Baikal.
A group of ostriches is called a flock.
The world's largest underground lake is in Namibia.
A group of otters is called a romp.
The world's highest navigable lake is Lake Titicaca.
A group of oysters is called a bed.
The world's longest underwater cave is in Mexico.
A group of panthers is called a claw.
The world's largest floating ice shelf is Ross Ice Shelf.
A group of partridges is called a covey.
The world's deepest submarine cave is in Czechia.
A group of pelicans is called a pod.
The world's largest tidal bore is on the Qiantang River.
A group of pheasants is called a bouquet.
The world's longest sea bridge is in China at 34 miles.
A group of pigeons is called a flock.
The world's tallest structure is the Burj Khalifa at 2,717 feet.
A group of platypuses is called a paddle.
The world's longest tunnel is the Gotthard Base Tunnel at 35 miles.
A group of quail is called a covey.
The world's deepest mine is Mponeng in South Africa at 2.5 miles.
A group of rabbits is called a colony.
The world's longest road is the Pan-American Highway at 19,000 miles.
A group of raccoons is called a gaze.
The world's largest dam by volume is the Three Gorges Dam.
